article.title: Los Angeles - West U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Los Angeles - West U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
West Los Angeles U.S. Export Assistance Center

11500 W. Olympic Blvd., Suite 601
Los Angeles, CA 90064

Staff Directory​

Julieanne Hennessy
Office Director
Phone: 310-235-7206
Fax: 310-235-7220
Email:JulieAnne.Hennessy@trade.gov
Industries:Franchising , Health Care Technologies: Medical & Dental Equipment, Drugs and Pharmaceuticals (including Food supplements), Textile & Apparel

Leticia Arias
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 310-235-7204
Fax: 310-235-7220
Email:Leticia.Arias@trade.gov
Industries:Artwork; Cosmetics & Toiletries; Environmental Technologies - Pollution / Water Resources; Ground Transportation – Parts / Accessories & Service Equipment; Sporting Goods & Recreation Equipment

Terri Batch
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 310-235-7212
Fax: 310-235-7220
Email:Terri.Batch@trade.gov
Industries:Auto Parts/Accessories & Service Equipment, Building Materials, Construction Equipment, Consumer Electronics: Audio/Video Equipment, Film/Video/Recording, Consumer Goods, Food Processing/Packaging, Processed Foods, Agricultural Equipment & Machinery, Giftware, Hotel & Restuarant Equipment, Industrial & Agricultural Chemicals, Marine Fisheries (seafood), Paper and Paper Products, Pet Food & Supplies, Printing Equipment,

Maura Kawai
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 310 235-7207
Fax: 310 235-7220
Email:Maura.Kawai@trade.gov
Industries:Communication Technologies, Computer Software, Education & Training, Entertainment Industries, Electronic Media Information, Telecommunications Equipment & Services, Photographic Equipment, Pleasure Boats & Accessories, Toys & Games

Cynthia Torres
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 310-882-1043
Fax: 310-235-7220
Email:Cynthia.Torres@trade.gov
Industries:Energy, Industrial Machinery, Plastics, Pet Products, Port Equipment, Shipbuilding Equipment

Delia Valdivia
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 310-235-7203
Fax: 310-235-7220
Delia.Valdivia@trade.gov
Industries:Aircraft/ Aircraft Parts, Airport/ Ground Support, Building Materials, Construction Equipment, Defense Industry Equipment, Hand & Power Tools, , Publishing, Safety & Security Equipment, Travel & Tourism

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

​
